channel.title: Writing on the willy weave
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on the willy weave

item.title: us two stars
item.description: ambient synths encho down hallways quiet chatter in a vaunted coffee shop as we grow further and further apart time drifts ever onward one day, we both say one day we’ll hangout one day we’ll catch up one day us two stars just weren’t meant to exist so close for this long -aw

item.title: ever onward in time
item.description: nothing starts at the end the most beautiful creations started with just an idea such is life a conception, a birth growing, and finding purpose that leap to start is the kindling foundation of what will exist ever onward in time -aw

item.title: the all consuming fog
item.description: sending shivers down the spine a panic, a flash in the pan looking left, right, all around the manic energy draining items scattered around life feeling like a tizzy the unknown an all consuming fog that haunts endlessly -aw

item.title: one way out
item.description: slices of my life a version of me that never would is the version of me i run away from never knowing your own next move is the one way out -aw

item.title: fire once burned
item.description: sputters and flashes of an ultraviolet magic a trail beyond one i’ve ever seen the consciousness and planning that allowed my paths to cross yours when things go awry, just remember flowers can yet bloom where fire once burned -aw

item.title: endless possibility
item.description: for generations living in fleeting moments we now exist in times too quickly outpacing us a shiny new thing, an underlying panic wrought to our core with distraction disease i struggle to stay present a livlihood of endless possitibility yet all that i need is right here with me, within ourselves -aw

item.title: trying
item.description: we’re all trying our best to get through this game of life do something, do nothing existing is what we’re meant to do don’t let anyone tell you you should be somewhere for you’re right where you ought to be -aw

item.title: return [here]
item.description: what distracts you? unmeasured things pulling you off the stage of life where does your mind go to? bring it here our perception, our awareness scattered and plotted in many different directions, things, ways what truly distracts you? return here is it worry, fear? lost in a daydream, future unclear or a panic of a past mistake any which way it pulls you bring it all back to you mind where your feet are

item.title: through the motions
item.description: oh that happened he said she said this was two days ago sent but no reply a mess here, a mess there lists that get written but never completed thoughts pile up like clothes actions taken yet conscious lags all happening so fast, a blur, a rush going through the motions slogging through it all a throughline without emotion present but not feeling what is a life without feeling -aw

item.title: waves & storm
item.description: in this age of quiet anxiety a shudder or a screech feeling lost or in between not sure where to go who to ask next for there’s no place like home when you’re lost at sea waves and storm of your mind thrash longing to be home somewhere feeling something whole again -aw

item.title: at all
item.description: to what do i owe the pleasure an inward facing eye a brain stem that fights to feel do i fight to feel? looking back in love, care, kind cherishing, grateful, happy sad that it’s come and gone but forever happy it came at all -aw

item.title: a return
item.description: when the tanks are empty but the heart is full friends are near and far hope is on your side i have friends everywhere just a hello away i’ll see you again my friend some summer day -aw

item.title: longing
item.description: what is grief if not love persevering a soul from a soul hopeless, detached always longing -aw

item.title: champagne supernova
item.description: constantly worlds collide a divine, collective spirits we’re right where we are meant to be yet somehow there is always more yearning for champagne supernova skies an interstellar awakening emotions that our being can’t comprehend what is out there -aw

item.title: stranger turned friend
item.description: a friend once a stranger the smiling face, a cheery laugh two people who ought not to be lonely that day -aw

item.title: variations of us humans
item.description: endless variations of our human makeup and yet one learns that we’re all the same yet all unique at the same time we learn and grow facing similar obstacles yet different all the same -aw

item.title: foggy paths forward
item.description: foggy paths give way to ripe forests when things are murky one must venture onward for there is nothing backwards except comfort and familiarity -aw

item.title: no good at goodbyes
item.description: a shy hello complemented with the bittersweet goodbye it doesn’t take long to truly know someone or ride the same wavelength -aw

item.title: come here, fringy friend
item.description: i always find the broken ones those hanging on the fringes thinking a bit different a more awkward folk but that’s where precious freedom lives in between the fringes people supporting people true love and care flourishing -aw

item.title: exchanges of humanity
item.description: at the end of the day aren’t we all just trying to find some same in the uniqueness some unique in the sameness a beautiful floor to a patterened ceiling every wallpaper in between we’re all a part of something bigger -aw

item.title: to have a home
item.description: what is a home a place to grow people in comfort to be yourself unconditionally a warm soup the coziest couch souls that caress this is a home -aw

item.title: an awful bind
item.description: to be in one place guided by this mind can be a real trouble feeling like an awful bind to each their own i tend to say yet we’re all similar in our own little ways -aw

item.title: to be an oak leaf
item.description: the calm of a glassy lake hissing of bugs not yet seen a morning frost a simple life, a quiet life oh to be the leaves on an oak tree swaying in a midsummers breeze with a great view of the world untouched by man and emotion -aw

item.title: moments lost to time
item.description: here we are taking our leaps of faith breathing in and taking what this world gives us catch your sighs just as they come for all that extra breath are precious moments lost to time -aw

item.title: the little helpers
item.description: the little helpers wordsmiths, event planners, coordinators all working in the background sometimes quiet, sometimes loudly do not disturb come back later for I know the reality right here is far better than where I feel I should be -aw

item.title: let time prevail
item.description: reaching mid-summer reminds me of comfortable chaos of summers past the chaos before the calm hints of a seasons change let time prevail as it will -aw

item.title: enjoy the sunshine
item.description: this warm excitement it’s like I know it doesn’t last but that is okay most things don’t last life is change changing from one thing to the next season to season day to day but that shouldn’t mean you can’t enjoy the sunshine while it’s there -aw

item.title: waves
item.description: in-breath, wave rolls in out-breath, wave rolls out be the sand beneath the waves continually renewed, refreshed let things come and let things go -aw

item.title: bits of us
item.description: i am worlds collided into one bits of me here bits of me there bits of us in everyone we meet be careful not to miss them -aw

item.title: blend of realities
item.description: caught in a blend of realities timelines that only ever existed within the fabric of my imagination so maybe they did, in fact, exist who is to say nostalgia is a form factor easily succumbed to the comfort of familiarity a sad, yet sweet aura smooth and buttery, yet soul crushing making you yearn for a life never lived -aw

item.title: my not-home
item.description: there are certain people enough smiles, warm greetings a familiar laugh, or comforting questions that make a place feel like home without ever being your home -aw

item.title: nose twitching
item.description: constant nose twitching reminds me that there are things i really can’t control we can observe ourselves but only really master our minds and souls -aw

item.title: absence of light
item.description: couldn’t tell you the last time i used facetime past 12am alone with my thoughts, my scrolling a digital cocoon i’ve been carried in finding solace in a familar tune the shadows keep me up at night darkness isn’t so bad when you realize it’s just absence of light -aw

item.title: there will be days
item.description: there will be days days when it’s murky, cloudy, dark days when it’s hot and unbearable days when it’s cold and unbearable days when you want to start days when you want to quit days when you feel on top of the world days when you feel as if you’ve ruined everything days when your mind is your best friend days when your mind is your worst enemy but one day

item.title: between two extremes
item.description: how i feel so young yet so old at the same time caught between two extremes battling for grasp, as i simply gasp for air to what do i owe the pleasure of meeting this present self in this moment here i am, for now -aw

item.title: pondering to wandering
item.description: i suppose i didn’t know to appreciate those tiny things the cool breeze, the autumn leaves but now i know sometimes it’s the looking back that helps us look forward a pondering that helps us in the wandering of life -aw

item.title: worlds only written
item.description: i have a habit of getting consumed by worlds only ever written whether told in story or song attachments to characters and moments that i’ll never see touch reality such magic envelops me each and every time to rebel, to fight, to live, to breathe i hold the inspiration as such a tangible feeling so what else can do except drift off to a new world in my mind -aw

item.title: the lonely sos
item.description: a sadness that knows no bounds something to keep me company as that all it has to be a visitor, a stranger to say hello through these thickets we climb we’re not alone in this venture find yours and keep them close and as always, take care -aw

item.title: a spark to light
item.description: one who cares must be vigilant for that is the price of freedom we all have a spark to light sometimes it just takes the right ignition what will it take for yours to ignite? for rebellion is built on hope -aw

item.title: what is this?
item.description: lost in thoughts just as I am in words lost amongst the numbers that give us collective meaning the numbers that mask creating mirages all of our emotions, thoughts, feelings boiling down to 0s and 1s what is this? -aw

item.title: spinning top
item.description: if i look cross, i apologize there is a world of worlds inside me each competing for their own attention their own shot at capturing my imagination like a spinning top it’s a mystery where it will land today however, it will land eventually -aw

item.title: are we here?
item.description: life demands presence like an outstretched hand branches blowing in the steady breeze it’s all here, it always has been but are we here? what do you see? what do you hear? what do you feel? -aw

item.title: to believe in love
item.description: to believe in love is to feel connection something greater than the sum of us a bridge that binds us wholly more than a type or a superficial mirage it’s the sickening feeling that you cannot exist without another for without them, you are truly lost -aw

item.title: restless times
item.description: tension growing like knots in a back or the energy in a full room the unsettling nature of coarse conversation may we find peace and unity we’re all struggling amongst each other in our own ways, on our own paths let us share this, together -aw

item.title: dominoes
item.description: one domino in front of the other cascading, falling, having an effect we are the dominoes changing one thing into another into another one domino fell a long ways away to get you to me and i’m forever grateful for every one that had to fall in between us -aw

item.title: a ship on the shore
item.description: where am i to go i keep my course the same yet a ship wasn’t meant for the shore alone adventure and life await in choosing a path of paths a health decisiveness is in order as well as courage and focus -aw

item.title: the labyrinth
item.description: inward can only be seen so far for sometimes i get lost in the labyrinth i build for myself in the end it all returns back to me for what is mine shall never miss me and sometimes just sometimes that is me -aw

item.title: scattered about
item.description: the little pieces scatter a subway hand to hold the cold railing of a patio bar sounds of the city mixed together like concrete how wonderful we all are as a community, with unity, united with our little pieces of us scattered about -aw

item.title: supper time tales
item.description: tales told at supper time are of pure magic to me tell me the stories of your life hearing songs of a past i can only imagine a fantasy of a world that once existed within our very midst what once was and may never be again -aw

item.title: when dreams come to me
item.description: when dreams come to me when it’s quiet and comfortable melancholy, cozy, familiar how i wish for different for how much i love this i know change is inevitable -aw

item.title: dance and worry
item.description: in dreams i dance and worry in wake i tarry and worry to what realm do I owe the pleasure of existing except that of my own mind we can’t control anything except our state of mind -aw

item.title: coffee shop crush
item.description: catching glances like they’re drops of rain part of a story i’d otherwise never hear crossing winding paths with strangers a little mix of whimsy and serendipity the odds of us both making it here today are astronomical, to put it plainly how did your path meet mine in this place a coffee shop crush to stay -aw

item.title: fidgety feelings
item.description: fidgety feelings oh how you plague me shuffling and moving and thinking one cascades into another, like tidal waves the calm comes from within i’m told something cultivated not pursued we create the things worth experiencing it’s within us, all of us, no? -aw

item.title: the noise
item.description: a dash of optimism followed by a double shot of realism where am I in this noise how do I find my way back to me everything is so serious and then so unserious at the same time nothing is as plain as it seems yet, you’d be surprised -aw

item.title: only wishing
item.description: shots of this, a spritz of that concoctions and potions sweet tangents and melodies to riff off taking us near and far within a moments time but are you here? is it just a momentary escape? these moments bring us meaning only wishing to be in this present with you -aw

item.title: grace upon your face
item.description: the sweetest smile that graces someones face makes all thd difference in a world like todays the glimmer of hope truly precious moments to be captured and forgotten magic, all in a days time -aw

item.title: breadcrumbs
item.description: to be lost and wandering only to the found again one day rediscovering yourself is a maze yet there are ways to find yourself through some days it’s not as clear what to say, or what to do only little inklings, breadcrumbs leading you back to yourself -aw

item.title: june
item.description: the blistering heat of summer beaming down on us flooding us with vitamin D and memories alike mentally residing in fond memories a june of a youth’s past homebound, ice cream, seventy degrees fleeting feelings hum all around -aw

item.title: hanging on for dear
item.description: commotion and energy, colliding and surfacing humans hanging on every last drop and fragrance empty chairs and signs of life a ghost of conversations past the face of someone I once knew in another life smile warm to the touch inside of us like hello fellow being i’m just happy you exist yet someone always leaves me leaves me attached, wanting wanting that connection, hanging on hanging on for dear, life

item.title: just like me
item.description: hello friend you’re just like me huh trapped in these thought spirals day after day, minute by minute one second you’re here the next you’re gone in some other world dissimilar from our own the 1-2-3s, the counting, the noting it can all help but befriend that loud voice the one that carries you away a certain mystical sense about it like when? or how? or even, why? be kind, my mind

item.title: dreamers and doers
item.description: can the dreamer, do? sitting idly by consumed by thoughts of a future one that may or may not happen does the doer, dream? one living in the moment being a part of this existence one assumes there must be dreams -aw

item.title: one big practice
item.description: change and change, letting go it’s a lot to manage if managed in detail but life is change it’s one big practice of letting go what is meant to be will find you what misses you, was meant to these paths and timelines will play out as needed -aw

item.title: magic we possess
item.description: what does this existence beg of me the gifts I feel inside what little magic I know I possess that we possess -aw

item.title: a critic and an observer
item.description: my critic and my observer the loud one and the quiet one like an elephant in a room there’s no existence without it no feelings without both of them -aw

item.title: bring us back to us
item.description: not a writers block just a block not feeling like myself some sort of block any ways but what do we do when we’re in a funk what kinds of things help bring us back to ourselves -aw

item.title: taught me to swim
item.description: lost in a sea of thought they swirl and swirl consuming and drowning me at times a bit much yet I’ve learned what once drowned me has taught me to swim to always be growing, changing -aw

item.title: our own debt
item.description: what exists between the hours of waking and the hours that I sleep again a managing of checklists and to-dos but where am I? am I there too? these simple things we oft forget is that our presence and being shall never be in our own debt -aw

item.title: the winding road
item.description: no one mentions how lonely the winding road is familiar faces and sounds so close, yet so far away one that must pave their own path must endure the trouble of lonliness a gripping isolation within a journey forgetting all assumptions once held -aw

item.title: here i wait
item.description: I sit and wait for these bubbles of fury emotions and feelings, thoughts ablaze here I wait their arrival is inevitable so why resist? it may only persist so I wait and observe -aw

item.title: cloudwatcher
item.description: let the feelings hit notice them, free them for what are we if not masters of our own minds? these thoughts can feast let them be see them arrive and float off like a jubilant cloud -aw

item.title: attention
item.description: beautiful things don’t ask for attention a moose grazing through a meadow the silent swaying of alpine thicket high above let the silence ring, notice its presence -aw

item.title: a desired coziness
item.description: that beauty and grace I crave that comfort and coziness a magical connection that thrives teaches, bridges, flourish and nourish -aw

item.title: a disconnect
item.description: I can see your flames but i can’t feel your heat so close to see and hear just out of reach, disconnected -aw

item.title: no rules to live by
item.description: there really are no rules in this thing called life today we dance in the forest agrin tomorrow we’ll cry in the seaside -aw

item.title: soul to a soul
item.description: why hello stranger we meet again but in different forms I say hello you say goodbye but the in between is what’s worth fighting for -aw

item.title: freeflowing calamity
item.description: i’m not sure I know what I’m after but I know what matters to me isn’t that all that matters truly? letting go and letting be the freeflowing calamitous nature of it all it is what it is, and it is what it isn’t -aw

item.title: there are windows
item.description: the winding pathways and inner workings of my mind somedays feel like a web of webs a spiraling staircase that never ends but there are windows there is music, an essence be merry, notice it and be still -aw

item.title: be and you'll see
item.description: what a strange and wonderful place care to stop to smell the roses or wait for the next wave to ride off on you see there are possibilities worth discovering if you’re able to escape the mind trap move, act, try something new be bold, be couragous, be mindful be and you’ll see -aw

item.title: hello stranger
item.description: hello stranger would you mind if I ask? are you open to new friends? what vibrations, what energy does our combination yield to us no outcomes just a positive feeling, a cheery face the gut brain doing what it does best glad you made it here into my weird little life -aw

item.title: burnt toast
item.description: time and space connect all in the blink of an eye we can go from wanting to having and losing that smell of burnt toast from when I was young bridging me through a spacetime what time travelers we are -aw

item.title: yearn for it all
item.description: the rustling of leaves a breeze and bloom all around this life has given me life a way to experience itself to feel, to sense, to breathe anew in my heart of hearts, I yearn for it all -aw

item.title: look back to look forward
item.description: what a difference a year makes the hopes and dreams I once had some come to fruition, some drift away look back in order to look forward the things that made you learn, grow, heal cherish them and find them, as they will not end -aw

item.title: playing controller
item.description: sometimes I stumble on the cracks in the sidewalk aware that they never meant to but I stop to observe the greens growing through the ever-persevering life manifest nothing we do can ever be permanent nature and it’s binding power is unlimited we’re just mere observers, playing controller -aw

item.title: what kind of pain
item.description: we all take strides from different walks of life differing perspectives and minds what does this mean, when we coalesce how we interact, how we show up where and when we decide to share the emotion that presents, the emotion that hides what pain begets pain, what joy begets joy how do we kiss moments goodbye, or hold on forever my pain versus your pain standing side by side what kind of pain do you hold

item.title: melancholy aroma
item.description: is it enough? is my presence enough? what more can I bring? what more can I be? simply existing, noticing being with is a present the intangible feelings a melancholy song and dance -aw

item.title: step by step
item.description: step by step view by view we ache and we ache by on by these winding turns of life we learn, we grow, becoming anew -aw

item.title: a blind path forward
item.description: uncertainty she’s the shadowy figure at the other end of the ballroom a blind path forward but intriguing nonetheless I coalesce and devolve into a static symphony as I lull myself ever more untoward -aw

item.title: lost in the world
item.description: these 0s and 1s the binary of life that makes up everything we are and everything we ought to be at the end of the day are we just a number? or something to shape to mold and create this universe -aw

item.title: always one step ahead
item.description: what do you hear when you’re alone with yourself is there chatter, waves of noise or just the sound of silence where does your wanderer go which paths do they wind and weave through your conscious being is a great servant but a bad master observe the observer watch where it goes, keep it close be curious of the curiosity staying one step ahead -aw

item.title: the same, but different
item.description: deep breath in a settling peace, like wind erasing dust the rain cleanses the earth a new beginning, a fresh start an exhale to release oxygen fuels flames of retreat the burning heat, scorching the roots and greens a new beginning all the same some endings and beginnings are just different the same, yes but different -aw

item.title: what is this feeling
item.description: lost among a sea the sea that built me only to realize everything around me, is me projections, mirrors, feelings, light, dark the very beginnings of time held next to nothing besides what we contain but what is this feeling I feel I feel -aw

item.title: when the day is nigh
item.description: one page flips to another a chapter resigns, dawns anew at the end of the day it is the passion that remains am I wrong for believing? hardly the opposite for when the day is nigh we’ll know the pain and suffering -aw

item.title: potent
item.description: careful: subject is highly concentrated an unknown potency, released to the world an amalgamation of everything beautiful and damned what do I have to offer this world what lurks below this surface like magma in a mantle, awaiting its time -aw

item.title: whitecaps to glass
item.description: don’t let me get ahead of me the mind stays calm like the winds on an open sea one gust, two gusts whitecaps aflash into towering mavericks only to return to a shimmering glass pane -aw

item.title: observer of the observer
item.description: random access memories from an intelligent field something we cannot yet fathom but from where do we pull our memories? as I observe the past observer it is within those shifts I recognize emotion, the senses all stored within us, within a larger repository -aw

item.title: you versus you
item.description: these thoughts can be drowning they can also be uplifting what power do you give them? what do you believe you’re made of? at the end of the day it’s you versus you take care of that fellow be kind, and find your path -aw

item.title: careful what you fish for
item.description: a once drawn melody rings around my brain a racket, a stirring the supple nature of it’s being be careful what you wish for you may just get it all be careful what you fish for you may just catch them all -aw

item.title: scar tissue
item.description: healing of wounds the gaping scars where once I had pain has been healed many times over the pain a distant memory yet the healing continues a reminder, an anchor in time a lesson that clings onto us -aw

item.title: the vastness that awaits
item.description: a vastness awaits a jumbled curiosity voyages not yet embarked yet all the possibilities exist -aw

item.title: meant for
item.description: what preserves these words through a time and space what erodes them except understanding and avail what is this for what am I meant to do -aw

item.title: amid our journey
item.description: are we all not explorers? astronauts? physicists? abound in our journey through life all finding our way, our place on this ride -aw

item.title: our home
item.description: we sit atop the most ancient thing to us this earth binds us, births us this is our home, our last stand within it, all things are made to last, or to pass on -aw

item.title: un-entertained jest
item.description: i need not entertain the jesters objective actions feed my thoughts let them joke, let them jest what comes and goes, will remain -aw

item.title: acolyte arms
item.description: acolyte arms go up yet I separate like oil and water a distinct being within an abyss the conscious mind dresses itself but what work does the subconscious do where does it lurk, who’s bidding does it do an ego, a superego, raw yet unbounded binding -aw

item.title: which takes the reigns?
item.description: is this coming from fear or love? which is taking the reigns here? I do not speak to escape silence I speak to honor and embrace it -aw

item.title: age of anxieties
item.description: a deep breath a pregnant pause the shrill whine but nothing can halt these thoughts the age of anxiety creeps in late nights turned into early mornings a corkscrew turning within me but there is something larger a thing at play here toiling with my soul, my being -aw

item.title: cosmos come to life
item.description: stardust that learned to feel a flare for the future lay here offering wisdom of millennia emotion born out of cosmos a gratitude truly rooted in this almighty consciousness may I be seen heard -aw

item.title: unfounded purpose
item.description: do you ever feel the weightlessness of our insignificance love all around us an existence to behold yet a purpose unfounded -aw

item.title: line-less
item.description: sometimes there is no silver slivers of gold to aid with sparks of bronze yet maybe this is left line-less no bright side just grief begging to be felt -aw

item.title: b&ps
item.description: bits and pieces a trail of papers crumbs of a lost whole but that whole exists somewhere at the end waiting patiently for all time -aw

item.title: empty words?
item.description: these words aren’t empty they hold my world they can hold yours too we exist in between them just as much as we exist within them a manifest of life -aw

item.title: glimpses
item.description: a soft glance hiding away again locked and stowed away but I saw a glimpse a glowing passion ignited love so pure it can’t be mistaken -aw

item.title: uncharted territory
item.description: not a problem to solve but a thing to experience an uncharted territory no map, but all possibilities exist a quantum reality of optimism the comforting bliss silence that quenches, not yearns purpose and intention intertwined a destiny of paths crossing where are we, and what will we become I don’t know what it is -aw

item.title: potion insert
item.description: in which a world sleeps we exist here to exist is to feel, to express nothing more i’ll try for all of my life just to find someone who leaves on the light for me -aw

item.title: windows to the soul
item.description: a glimpse of you shattered my synapses, stuttered my heart a soul passing another soul yet here we are, miles and miles apart the windows to the soul a gateway through time we exist in these limiting spaces just long enough to learn meaning -aw

item.title: nestled expressions
item.description: the inherited lines of the earth defining what is below just as it does above these curvatures, nestled expressions a face upon your face what is below your present-above? -aw

item.title: the pages given to us
item.description: days pass like pages plot building, world weaving no end in sight but always knowing that end exists while we always remember best the beginnings and the endings it’s what happens between that makes a story complete -aw

item.title: what will remain of me
item.description: the waves of time crash upon the shore taking what they must leaving only what remains a teacher of acceptance letting a thing drift away what will remain of us when the waves of time come crashing -aw

item.title: where have we found ourselves?
item.description: what kind of path lies ahead the one question on my mind hit with the aromatic innocence yet the powerful magnetism draws me in the sensitive ones, the feelers you soft, yet nimble being keeps me exploring and digging what kind of beauty lurks below as above what have I stumbled upon which path led me to you to which steps do I have to thank what kind of story have we found ourselves in?

item.title: connection, not attachment
item.description: once in a brambling wood of life the path of mine was crossed a doe standing in the midst quiet, observing, standing yet connection is all I felt an understanding, a contract these things of life they try to teach a craving and endearment is what remained -aw

item.title: the myths in which we sleep
item.description: in a society that is hyper individualist I reach out to build community for I know the compassion we need should compensate for our losses the myths in which humanity currently sleeps keep us divided for there is no profit or power without this division -aw

item.title: this existence
item.description: fan the flames of curiosity celebrate this existence we share while we have this life to give -aw

item.title: energy, frequency, and vibration
item.description: nuances within nuances we attract and we push away living energies and beams of light feel it, embrace it, recognize it -aw

item.title: a skin unlike your own
item.description: everyone operates differently were the same but different living in a skin that may not always feel like our own -aw

item.title: shooting pains
item.description: sticky corners and shooting pains stars in alignment bubble across the galaxy in my glass everything is important yet unimportant all the same -aw

item.title: shackled
item.description: to go from the world created around us to the world created by us is a shocking revelation by shackling nature in our midst all we’ve truly done is shackle ourselves -aw

item.title: a lonely fir
item.description: pieces of us exist everywhere shards, flakes, energies that lonely fir a brick amongst bricks the winds of time and the space that carry us -aw

item.title: paradise in these hills
item.description: soft smiles, a quick glance a shanty simmer of a hearty laugh eyes like pools of manuka honey that elusive yet endearing blend of innocence experience bubbling over something which only life and pain brings -aw

item.title: a thread to pull
item.description: you’ll see pull that thread intertwined whether unwinding or completing you resolve for the better -aw

item.title: four feet apart
item.description: four feet apart yet we’re worlds away a holocene view of these enamoring views but i’d just like to truly be next to you distractions and fragmentations connecting bridge at both ends ties and threads trusting one another so maybe we’re not so far apart, you and I -aw

item.title: this unspoken contract
item.description: hello friend if you’re reading this we have a contract you the reader, absorber, feeler myself the writer, creator, weaver what do we make of this no ideas were dreamt of successes or failures just a void and some firing neurons if you’re reading this, take care of yourself -aw

item.title: what matters
item.description: everything matters and nothing matters all in one, all the same the vistas we gaze upon the time given to us in this realm let us dream our dreams -aw

item.title: not my day
item.description: wit and weather have not been my friends a monday of all mondays, catch me outside yet I persist, without resisting all things change, and all change comes the best we can do is adapt and let go for that is the one constant in this life -aw

item.title: out of touch
item.description: do you ever have days or stretches where you just feel a bit disconnected? no matter how much sleep or joy something just feels off? struggling with bad habits and feelings just below the surface a lingering might that pulls you along -aw

item.title: a whirlwind of life
item.description: this life has ways of catching us off guard life a gust of wind in a sail that you didn’t even know was there moving you, guiding you, pushing you through -aw

item.title: our golden path
item.description: to be in lockstep more than passing gazes inextricably linked, unmoving not as a duty or an obligation but as discovery, curiosity, passion a wanting to be caught in the throes of a divine world I may not know you yet it may be some time along this golden path but here I journey, and here I remain -aw

item.title: I've been thinking
item.description: I’ve been thinking lately it’s been a lot thinking about thinking pondering about that thinking are these spirals bound to spiral? unwinding and winding up again? to whom do I even ask these questions? if not my spiral-bound friend -aw

item.title: a wondering awe
item.description: chaos amidst chaos manufactured unruliness leave it be, let the organic nature flow anxieties and unbridled fear being stoked fragmented, divided, and isolated we lack the fresh, empowering connections the organic and alive, the unbounded and raw, an unexpected outcome within a wondering awe -aw

item.title: myths that hold us
item.description: I recognize the shapes of existing forces their processes of creation the relationship we have to myths in which men sleep and we so quickly forget -aw

item.title: welcome to the world
item.description: welcome to this world young one i’m not sure to which world you’ve arrived but may peace and love prosper and allow you to grow for all time -aw

item.title: bring about life
item.description: to bring about life instead of taking it away -aw

item.title: purpose & meaning
item.description: lacking purpose lacking meaning glaring lights and sterile perfumes am I the best version I can be? Do I need to be? sickening hopelessness until the end of the tunnel lights a flicker is all that was ever needed -aw

item.title: all of the its
item.description: all these ‘its’ with coloured lenses atop them but how else do we derive meaning or character without forms and factions of good and bad honourable and distasteful -aw

item.title: choose chaos
item.description: do I choose chaos? do I dare subject myself to the fire? will it mold me, or will it leave me formless is that up to me? when do I know enough to decide? that uninhibited limit, that boundary is it contrived, is it judgmental am I wrong? -aw

item.title: profligate
item.description: learning and growing taking matters into my own hands only controlling what I can control as a society, our wants tend to be wasteful things upon things upon things a menacing of waste to fill empty space -aw

item.title: wasn't so serious
item.description: what if the things we took seriously weren’t needed to be taken seriously? and the things we didn’t take seriously were the things we ought to take seriously -aw

item.title: no reaction
item.description: some things truly vex whereas others truly persuade but when is the last time something gave you pause true pause a moment to recollect yourself just to sit with the emotion and let it fade away -aw

item.title: what if we
item.description: what if we were wrong what if capturing every moment has turned into not knowing which moments to truly capture -aw

item.title: a meditation of the self
item.description: mind where your feet are that’s what they say what is my mind if not a drunken monkey it runs, it clamors, it latches on yet noticing these and coming back home brings a certain ease -aw

item.title: mesmerizing innertopia
item.description: the color red, but only certain shades a brilliant hue of blue, with falsetto horns a skyline with single blotted clouds and company so sweet and kind a spiral is just most times the gravity just works that way as in nature, a spiral works downwards in few ways yet the simple things create a utopia of the mind -aw

item.title: little wonders
item.description: anxieties and inner workings internalized thoughts and spherical spiraling magnetism of life and belonging I see all these shapes and forms and just wonder I wonder why I wonder how I wonder if, then what am I the only one? -aw

item.title: a love letter to pluto
item.description: the small one, the weak one the wallflower of our solar system some say you don’t matter with all that matter but I say you do you see, you’re still a rocky mass a sight to behold if you had an atmosphere I’m sure it would have worked though none of us can be too sure to me you’re still a planet existing and floating through time remind us that you’re there

item.title: a friend to my friend
item.description: to be a boy making friends sharing sand a trainset and some blocks oh to be a kid growing old and realizing we’re the same kids we used to be they’re just different blocks caring, opening, holding that space and love -aw

item.title: my thoughts alone
item.description: my existence a myriad of thoughts like floating in a pool hovering around, taking up space we tend to the things that need tending to but do we ever evaluate them what is a weed (lol) if not a label -aw

item.title: who am I to judge
item.description: time and tide wait for no man we’re all passing through life on this rock devouring and learning our own meanings each to the same inevitable end who am I to judge myself for trying, being, existing only one shot we get, in this little life this speck of time on an infinite canvas of existence -aw

item.title: a checked box
item.description: the passion the bridles a love that is sweet and blissful the alchemist turning coal for others into gold for thineself I want to do it for the joy, the feeling the way others describe it a spark, a fire, a passionate venture not just another checked box to be filled -aw

item.title: the facade
item.description: feeling this thinking that ideas springing off walls like 1000s of bouncing balls this anxiety keeps me chained invisibly yet inextricably bound to something hidden in shadows existing, but yet to be found -aw

item.title: down to my core
item.description: this weave, I come back for myself to each and every day drive me down to my core let the words that come to me speak through me and within for that is where the answers lie -aw

item.title: radiantly pure
item.description: suppose it’s true that we’re in this existence of life dancing among the stars so brilliantly and pure why should we compare our spark of life our shimmering and radiating energy to that of another -aw

item.title: closure
item.description: healing, growing, changing for the better when mirrors don’t reflect all that we are is it our fault? where did we go wrong? skimming on the reflections focusing on the imperfections in a world full of mistakes and rawness -aw

item.title: a friend
item.description: a hearty laugh and a pint glass full we often forget how simple it can be the pleasure we seek so far and wide can be found right next to ye -aw

item.title: one day
item.description: one day I’ll be that way one day I’ll get there one day I’ll do that thing one day I’ll understand one day creating our own futures only to breed inevitable anxieties about them yet we are forever rooted in the present -aw

item.title: devisive
item.description: our instinct is to connect, grow and flourish be with one another, help one another through trials and tribulations yet we’re divided, besmirched and erased like a line of writing, or a harnessed thing but we remain the power, just divided -aw

item.title: wasting away
item.description: this existence is treacherous we bind and we breed becoming anew and making waves and yet each passing day feels like a curse just time to be filled -aw

item.title: pieces of me
item.description: day by day night after night someone to love someone to share with pieces are scattered everywhere for what’s in your memory of me when I’m gone or unseen with nothing left not even a fragrance how am I memorized if at all -aw

item.title: shells of us
item.description: a shell of what I once was a seedling of what I’ve only started to become the only constant here is change like water, we need movement stay stagnant, and we’ll stew and swamp -aw

item.title: everything is a mirror
item.description: this thing in you i may not like is a thing in me i may not like little acts of reflection stowed away, hidden in plain sight we’re so simple yet we’ve strayed from love and light -aw

item.title: self reflections
item.description: the shadows hold my secrets but do they keep them? without much luck tend to find myself avoiding I lean into the care, yet I find myself pulling away -aw

item.title: golden waves
item.description: a string of notes the rasp of an acoustic the flicker of a smile and laugh on the other side a heart melts, begets and begets connected in ways beyond the obvious -aw

item.title: crying
item.description: how mixed up we’ve become laughing until we cry and crying until we laugh the duality is real but the feelings? -aw

item.title: meet me in viridian city
item.description: a kid that has never quite grown pixels upon pixels dreams being dreams, little else to do a d-pad and a box of legos take me back, just for a day let the bliss be bliss -aw

item.title: wallflower boy
item.description: a double, triple entendre flowers grow where flowers may eyes linger and eyes flutter where it grows is where it stays only natural things where it ought it to be is where it will stay -aw

item.title: a transient state of mind
item.description: to do or not to do the leathery scratch that being a medium brings nothing is ever black and white cut and dry words upon a page are the closest -aw

item.title: touch
item.description: to be held it was once said could heal a human be held, and be still -aw

item.title: false pretenses
item.description: no outcomes should be the outlook detaching from a possible future still maintaining connection yet disconnecting from those false pretenses -aw

item.title: shadows of work
item.description: the places where contradictions live corners of a mind where you don’t dare to look dust off the cobwebs, make it count these are the places where we make it count making the worst of us, into the better for us we all have our shadows of work -aw

item.title: a quiet place
item.description: find that place that calls you a mindset, a future you adore all wrapped up within an experience -aw

item.title: gripping realities
item.description: a dark night awakens chokes me with it’s shadowy figures dimmed lights and quiet notes a chest heavy with worries unknown chilled and stunned all the same deep breath in, hold, deep breath out -aw

item.title: the sand and dust
item.description: the wind is course public discourse over livlihoods and plans within plans gritting, biting the words sting like a thousand cuts let us have peace -aw

item.title: land o land
item.description: we are nature and nature is us returning to your roots is simply returning to yourself connecting with the deeper self releasing inhibitions constructed by a new reality -aw

item.title: sweet child
item.description: sweet child for what future did we pave you had no hope to begin with but cherish what you can and spread love while you can for this life is truly short -aw

item.title: whole
item.description: I’m here, I’m whole so why do I feel so bro ken -aw

item.title: we're a lot a alike you know
item.description: we’re a lot alike you know thinking, thinking about thinking that little voice in your head that reads these words off the screen yet everything we know, we must detach from the “I” must detach from itself subatomic metacognition, thinking about thinking about thinking and then, bliss, oneness, infinity -aw

item.title: an age of entropy
item.description: in an age where everything is numbed desenstization has reached peak control the entropy of human consciousness is low the only dials being turned are the ones of fear, hate, divisiveness when resources are low, fear is the driving force -aw

item.title: chemicals altering chemicals
item.description: a pill for the pain you feel another for the pain you might feel another for the past pain you felt when does it end? when we focus ourselves on the root, the core and not the symptoms themselves glorfying and mulling in numbness is not the way -aw

item.title: watch your footing
item.description: look around us at this world we’ve created the consumers being the consumer the ever viscious cycles of torment destroying of earthly practices and love may we return to our roots, find our footing -aw

item.title: products of products
item.description: take away everything I have everything you own things you hold, feel, touch what are you then? build upon that raw foundation someone who continues to strive the basis of who we are is not found in external things but within ourselves -aw

item.title: the wind at your back
item.description: give yourself the grace the strength to move persistence, energy, intention whatever held you back before no longer holds you you’re strong, you’re capable feel that wind at your back? that’s courage, friend not putting out your spark, but igniting it -aw

item.title: my world?
item.description: this is my world this is your world what do we make of this? is it yours? or mine? a shared collection of both together, we embrace, we strive, we grow like trees sharing the sunlight we grow alongside one another -aw

item.title: nothing and everything
item.description: nothing and everything both matter to rise up, seize a moment to fall back again and disintegrate we’re all parts of one whole of life let’s bring love, light and joy each day optional listening: Jacob & the Stone, by Emile Mosseri -aw

item.title: green fusion
item.description: being green, being blue what does it mean to you? the burdens we carry the emotions we stow away may you find the peace you need to better understand yourself and the world around you -aw

item.title: fractals
item.description: if you’re ever curious about the ways of nature simply look at the branches of a tree from bottom to top the dissecting and weaving of the branches like endless timelines marking their definite paths -aw

item.title: what am I to do
item.description: what am I to do holding all of these memories dear cherishing, relishing, capturing time holds no memories uncapsulated, they fleet only to be captured by us and let go by death alone -aw

item.title: winds of change
item.description: fluidity holds the universe’s secret atomic structures identically being the same yet form something that is always changing whether water or sand the formations and destructions are molded by this inevitable changing of tides -aw

item.title: the moderns
item.description: buy buy buy take take take have have have instead of cherish, appreciate, reconcile reset, repeat, reuse -aw

item.title: the little death
item.description: they can take my time but not my soul a heart yearning for creative output ideas that swarm nothing but my insides -aw

item.title: wars we attend to
item.description: each and every day we ride in the face of death opposing it at every turn so much time, but so little patience these are the modern wars we face the ones in our mind, the ones in plain sight -aw

item.title: controlled experiment
item.description: wave function collapse but unlike a dying star it’s a controlled commitment out of all potential futures I unequivocally choose you to be my reality -aw

item.title: timebender
item.description: let me bend timelines let me arrive at the destinations that my soul desires all possible states dance in my head I see the paths that lie ahead but allow me to choose the one my soul craves -aw

item.title: unmet conditions
item.description: a repeated loop retrying, collapsing, retrying always retrying until the initial condition is finally met getting better, closer little by little every moment -aw

item.title: the rot of life, pt. 2
item.description: here I sit here I wait time drones on inner workings on the universe converging at a very moments notice the energy, the timing all collapsing like a function mathematical blissfulness -aw

item.title: rotting away existence
item.description: here I rot here I wait life on the other side of these four walls so much to be grateful for but so much to miss this too shall pass like storm clouds rolling on by -aw

item.title: stay a while
item.description: what is the rush after all we only get so much time stay a while longer -aw

item.title: life is in presence
item.description: tell that person you like them enjoy the slowness of your day take a deep breath life is now, life is in presence -aw

item.title: dangerous nostalgia
item.description: longing for a past that no longer exists can lead to a future that only brings dismay -aw

item.title: decoration
item.description: paint scattered across a canvas decorating the essence of space let’s make music together decorating the essence of time -aw

item.title: many worlds
item.description: decisions upon decisions plans within plans within plans yet we squabble over the niceties zoom out, dig in what magic is surrounding us connect, recapture, care, love -aw

item.title: a hushed whisper
item.description: a whisper of the wind the cold press against the cheek one of mother earth’s many greetings accompanied by the most captivating sunset rays of golden flame framing the sky, sparking the hearts of onlookers -aw

item.title: a digital footprint
item.description: if my own eyes are the only ones to see this does it still exist? does it still make an impact? does it reach anything? does it’s energy ripple like waves in this vast unlimited exosphere? -aw

item.title: chaos
item.description: chaos and order are a lot more similar than we would expect for those who hold order cause the chaos and those who stoke chaos expect order -aw

item.title: a common good
item.description: a rush a rush we’re all in a hurry can talk for five minutes and then I have to scurry for what I don’t know there is so much calamity but why oh why it’s only myself that I pity -aw

item.title: branching of time
item.description: time is of the essence but what is this essence no future, nor past inextricably linked with space time is bound, branching, weaving look to the trees, for only they know -aw

item.title: mud to water
item.description: what is clean may become dirty and what is dirty may again become clean -aw

item.title: novelty of a thing
item.description: while pursuits are noble eventually the heart may fade a fleeting feeling the mundane is simply mundane new adventures peer over the horizon the novelty has been worn through -aw

item.title: what is
item.description: embrace what is and what was and what will be will fade away -aw

item.title: a creator
item.description: anyone can create possible iterations lie everywhere there are stories to be told for when the time is right a story doesn’t merely get created it is willed into existence -aw

item.title: emotional states
item.description: our states of being floating with us, and around us like clouds in the sky a fragrance that captivates and controls -aw

item.title: a note to a stranger
item.description: if you’re reading this friend just know that we are more connected than you will ever know divided by constructs or distance waves of particles and energy dance aglow soul to another soul, keep on going -aw

item.title: embued, embossed
item.description: we cannot lose our divets our hope, our failures our passion that ignites the things that make us, us be the divet, be the marker be the change, embrace the difference -aw

item.title: hopelessly optimistic
item.description: what is being romantic If not endlessly and hopelessly optimistic torturing ourselves with the pursuit of something bigger than we can even begin to comprehend -aw

item.title: give yourself the grace
item.description: give yourself grace for this is but the first time you are stumbling your way through this crazy life take your time, take it easy be gentle with yourself -aw

item.title: growing, slowly growing
item.description: day by day, moment by moment all learning, growing, climbing remember those moments from down below from whence you came let it serve as a reminder that had to win over the sole critic yourself -aw

item.title: true timing
item.description: words dance and wind rhymes that sparkling warm feeling arrived just in perfect time didn’t see it coming at first but the surest things in the universe tend to come in a burst -aw

item.title: galaxy glass
item.description: I want a wealth of you a galaxy in a glass the beautiful and divine like a shimmering glass of the purest wine -aw

item.title: demons dance together
item.description: the tangible feeling the rawness, the harsh past scratching clawing it’s way through your mind wounds become obsolete with the right person around introducing your demons to each other letting them dance together healing and harmonious darknesses intertwined creating light -aw

item.title: dive in
item.description: you know you are strong when you’re able to dive in head first knowing things may not last but also knowing were strong before and you’ll be strong forevermore -aw

item.title: hope among the despair
item.description: nature is our constant reminder that nothing is permanent ever changing, growing, morphing what one was, will never be again grains of sand, death and rebirth green to brown to green again may you know that even if it’s believed to be the end it is simply a new beginning -aw

item.title: in time, in time
item.description: blank pages stories unwritten things still to be said, and unsaid spaces to fill, gaps to close we are enough and everything, in time -aw

item.title: the renewal
item.description: who am I but a person a collection of thoughts, ideas, others a fragrance, an essence, a celestial thing a cosmic entity of organic matter who am I but a living thing, an organism existing -aw

item.title: dear capricorn
item.description: dear capricorn hardworking, trusty soul keep your wit close and your heart closer the end of the year is nigh so hold strong and hold fast for you’re in for a ride of a lifetime -aw

item.title: a natural chorus
item.description: let the leaves sing such a natural chorus the pitter patter of rain the world of nature reign -aw

item.title: conjured reality
item.description: biodigital jazz, he quips what age are we in in which reality have we conjured a space so limited yet unlimited -aw

item.title: the steam engine of life
item.description: a headache, a pain, a strain keep the steam train rolling until this fades away guided by mere thoughts as I treck down this unmarked path of life -aw

item.title: my child
item.description: my child you’ll be able to place your feelings know who they are and from whence they came they are not to be ashamed of but only to be appreciated cared for, admired, observed for they truly only serve you -aw

item.title: rampant
item.description: all by its lonesome, my mind runs rampant nothing but thoughts carry me away for each and every one of us has our own pitfalls, doubts, fears such as a cold front clears out the atmosphere a few utter words, mere breaths with variance are enough to make me forget make all the difference -aw

item.title: awakened
item.description: you awoke something within me something I felt existed but couldn’t quite unlock myself the gentle key that is you a bellows to a withering flame -aw

item.title: indecisiveness
item.description: for someone so indecisive you were the easiest choice not one second-guess you can be mine, be my mess -aw

item.title: terra
item.description: I’ll be the earth you nourish giving life, sharing life the essence of extraordinary a beauty defined by nature -aw

item.title: moments fleeting
item.description: all moments are fleeting good moments are captured whether by the mind or the soul some moments captured by both cherish them, protect them, hold them then just like that, let them be free -aw

item.title: occupado
item.description: occupy that space in my mind occupy that space in my heart make a little less room for everything else -aw

item.title: love is
item.description: love is just love the nonsensical thing we just do it doesn’t have to make sense to make sense it just is -aw

item.title: am I cooked?
item.description: if you have me questioning my extra “ha” at the end of a “haha” just know i’m cooked and you’ve captured my heart -aw

item.title: pageturner
item.description: be my favorite novella each day I hope to turn a new page and each day the next seems better than the last be my page turner captivating, illustrious may I never reach the end, though I know it’s inevitable -aw

item.title: bookworm
item.description: like starting a book halfway through, but still wanting to turn every page, to learn how you got to this point, and how you caught my attention. -aw

item.title: thoughts rambling
item.description: thoughts ramble like clouds in the sky, where I am takes no meaning. Purpose is bare and future grin, how we ought to be present and soak it all in -aw

item.title: detach, detach
item.description: silent flutterings of time connecting slowly but surely connecting with everything detaching from everything -aw

item.title: may my children
item.description: may my children understand their emotions, feel them never hear a raised decibel without explanation or apology -aw

item.title: found
item.description: never alone merely unfounded where you are you will be found -aw

item.title: every seasons colour
item.description: I’ve liked you in fall i’ve liked you in summer I think i’d like you in every seasons colour -aw

item.title: the humanity in us all
item.description: don’t betray your humanity put it down put everything down breathe in, breathe out you are only human there is no need to carry the weight of the world on your perfect shoulders -aw

item.title: jedi
item.description: the jedi were right don’t lose yourself in attachment for it only leads to suffering know your presence, know your worth be a giver without attaching -aw

item.title: tense
item.description: an unnoticable tenseness it creeps in silent but cunning deep breath relax the body take back the control and peace -aw

item.title: the world around us
item.description: the silent flutters the calm pitter pattering waves shake and branches creak the late day gold gleams and grows -aw

item.title: moments that dissipate
item.description: let go the moments dissipate quickly but only there can we exist forever -aw

item.title: how I wished
item.description: how I wished to be older when I was younger but how wrong I was learn to cherish where you’re at for one day you’ll look back and wish you were right here -aw

item.title: hauntingly
item.description: what drew you in closer what universe did I pull you away from weaving you into my orbit this cosmic entanglement an intergalactic opportunity hauntingly astonishing -aw

item.title: waiting, breathing
item.description: waiting, breathing the wind curses out your name a steadfast rock sitting atop the highest mountain top waiting, breathing -aw

item.title: have you?
item.description: have you ever felt the weight of a moment? the sting of a feeling? the sharp and dull of the everyday life don’t let it weigh on you accept the feelings that come be the riverbed that time flows through like water carving, changing, persevering -aw

item.title: the human condition
item.description: how innocent and fragile the human condition you remember my name if I remember yours? the time machine we live in a passage of cosmic proportions let’s take this ride together hold me close, don’t let go -aw

item.title: what it means to be human
item.description: the gravity of art, of creation allows us to tap into humanity tethering onto the very things that make us feel whole, and human -aw

item.title: polarity
item.description: seeking positivity avoiding negativity sometimes they are one in the same there is no one without the other -aw

item.title: are you looking?
item.description: are you looking? look to the sky, look to the moon when we’re both gazing upon the crescent above I just simply don’t feel so alone in this world -aw

item.title: seasons
item.description: be my four seasons consistent, cunning, always there from the summer we met until the winter when we got closer -aw

item.title: the teacher in you
item.description: teachers are a blessing sometimes we gain the best lessons from the things around us how nature teaches us to persevere how moments teach us how to let go how we teach ourselves how to exist within ourself sometimes the teacher is ourselves -aw

item.title: waiting for to bloom
item.description: letting time slip through my fingers but do I tell a rose when to bloom? some things take time in time all things blossom undeterred, in their own time or am I letting you slip through my fingers -aw

item.title: the power you keep
item.description: a single raindrop falls like a tear the single wreckless cloud that covers your sunny day what power do you give? what power do you keep? the power is in you -aw

item.title: so which is it
item.description: caught in between having all the time in the world and never having enough so which is it? do I have forever with you or shall I still cherish every moment? -aw

item.title: no matter the waves
item.description: like an boat on the wild sea you must take the gentle waves just as you take the ravaging ones for I once heard that a ship was not made to sit in a calm bay rather it was meant to be at sea, no matter the waves -aw

item.title: there is a way
item.description: vapid and unrelenting greed harshly burn our futures with unseeing eyes and cold hearts a path forward looks ever grim there is a way a way through the madness that ensues stop destroying, start enjoying freeing, liberating, succumbing -aw

item.title: pixels upon pixels
item.description: pixels upon pixels upon pixels dancing lights and parade of glass the touches of a screen yet I feel connected -aw

item.title: the light still shines
item.description: the dim light shines at the end of a tunnel a mirage, a blasphemous lie for the end may never be reached yet the light still shines as bright as a distant star always within sight but always out of reach -aw

item.title: entropy
item.description: two souls that just so happened to bump into one another what a strange and beautiful thing let the entropy unfold and begin anew -aw

item.title: this time, it's different
item.description: quick to forgive quick to forget but this time is different fight for what’s right stand up for others, be proud take what’s yours and leave the rest -aw

item.title: find your weird
item.description: find your weird and don’t let it go this is your soul, your spirit greeting you again and again perhaps it’s best if you share it -aw

item.title: let it all
item.description: let the flames flow let the waves crash let the wind blow harsh let it let it all -aw

item.title: the giver
item.description: i’m a giver I give not because I need to I give because I want to because my spirit insists a thing I can’t temper and don’t really wish to -aw

item.title: the start of beginning
item.description: the start of beginning an empire once started from one just like a revolution sometimes all it takes is just to move start, just start -aw

item.title: wave function collapse
item.description: wave function collapse but unlike a dying star it’s a controlled commitment out of all potential futures I unequivocally choose you to be my reality -aw

item.title: all those that bloomed
item.description: once you plant all the seeds only after time will you realize which roses are worth picking but it doesn’t stop you from appreciating all that bloomed with the same love, attention, appreciation -aw

item.title: idk what this is
item.description: like soaked stone in the sea with waves crashing in coming in and out of sight i don’t know what this is said the human so why should fright -aw

item.title: another soft landing
item.description: you’re more than meets the eye your grace and intelligence speak when vocal chords aren’t around your stare reverberates, richochets through the inner workings of my mind always landing softly, gently -aw

item.title: we know nothing
item.description: time ticks time waits for no one an otherworldly, alien concept we conjured this ourselves thinking we know what we created, understood we know nothing -aw

item.title: let love prevail
item.description: let love guide your path in a world without a sun there is considerable darkness little hope be a light for others share it, spread it love your neighbor let love prevail in the end -aw

item.title: without darkness
item.description: there is a future out there filled with love filled with light without darkness light would not be so clear, necessary -aw

item.title: what we call life
item.description: to be human is to crave order but to also learn, understand, grow but you eventually come to realize that chaos is the only thing that exists a transforming, transfiguring entropy this is what we call life -aw

item.title: limiting forms
item.description: a dream of desires but why do I desire feeling limited by this human form my spirit, my being and essence crave more than this existence something larger is at work -aw

item.title: lessons in disguise
item.description: an agony a pain these lessons in disguise why is this happening to me? no what is this teaching me? -aw

item.title: don't change
item.description: don’t change for me don’t change for anyone don’t change let the world see you the cost is far too high to fold like a bill -aw

item.title: facing the music
item.description: seeing all sides of both of us the faces we put on, and take off the stage and the behind the scenes hear the critics, face demons enjoying it all, together -aw

item.title: press to start
item.description: i don’t know what this is do we take the paths or do the paths take us spread out ahead of me possible futures dance like lit corridors deep breath in, deep breath out press to start -aw

item.title: blood red leaves
item.description: leaves blood red the disconcerting caw of a crow looming grey clouds rambling on and on wind sending chills upward along your spine fall, a time for finding comfort and warmth among the unsettling and resettling -aw

item.title: the hopeless optimist
item.description: what is being romantic if not hopelessly optimistic torturing ourselves within the pursuit of something bigger than we can even begin to comprehend -aw

item.title: growing
item.description: growth is but a thing of life spurts of failing, learning, living know that it is always better to grow than to be stagnant and withering -aw

item.title: fragments
item.description: nothing truly ever leaves you fragments exist a trove of delicate remains waiting to be rediscovered the memories, the care songs that had once been shared the love that was, made to last an unexpiring miracle within us all -aw

item.title: peaks within valleys within peaks
item.description: plans within plans within plans the peaks alongside the valleys of life the constant string of life pulling us along the universal timeline maybe we were wrong about time about seconds and money measuring worth instead of the unconditional love the intangibility that brings meaning and warmth worth it’s weight in imaginary gold -aw

item.title: this too
item.description: may you look at the clouds and remember that all things pass in time may you look at the last leaves of fall or the blades of grass upon the ground and remember that time cannot take all we are merely a creekbed time is the river flowing through us around us -aw

item.title: whimsical life
item.description: what kind of magic surrounds us the unseen, unheard, the unshakable feelings of whimsy and serendipity forces beyond our eyes that simply make what is, flourish and unfold -aw

item.title: pinholes
item.description: the words find us when we need them the most like the pinholes shining through the darkness that is night let them in, let them guide you your north star is already out there -aw

item.title: simply, be
item.description: be the mountain intricate, complex, unmoving changing slowly and surely allow yourself to exist and then simply be -aw

item.title: unpacking
item.description: there’s something beautiful about seeing someone’s baggage as more than an accompaniment as something to unpack and untangle together -aw

item.title: the journey
item.description: in an arduous journey there are peaks and valleys but you don’t get one without the other the universal trials of life we must all face to be human is to accept this but still retain hope -aw

item.title: comet
item.description: like a comet you burst into my life if only for a moment I caught a glimpse of unshakable beauty don’t leave so soon -aw

item.title: ever deserving
item.description: you deserve love like flowers deserve the rain and sunshine inevitable and unconditional it’s out there, as long as you accept it -aw

item.title: trust your wings
item.description: a bird lands on a branch not worrying about whether the branch will break for it trusts in its wings -aw

item.title: impermanence
item.description: nature is our constant reminder that nothing is permanent ever changing, growing, morphing what one was, will never be again grains of sand, death and rebirth green to brown to green again may you know that even if it’s believed to be the end it is simply a new beginning -aw

item.title: equilibrium
item.description: is it nourishing or drowning is it warming or disintegrating is it guiding or gusting is it grounding or limiting like elements, we have duality a balance to admire a natural equilibrium to adopt -aw

item.title: gifts we never asked for
item.description: gratitude is a blessing simple appreciation for what is rather than what ought to be a lived breath rather than an unsung breath a gift you never asked for but received delightfully anyways -aw

item.title: words
item.description: words words beautiful phonics stringing us along, day by day they come and go leaving and returning empowering, uplifting never to own but to hold and share -aw

item.title: the other shoe
item.description: I like who I can be around you coming out of my shell breaking down every last wall enjoying the passage of time there will never be another you so I guess that’s why i’m stuck waiting for the other shoe -aw

item.title: welcome to the weave
item.description: we are all just single threads in this giant weave of life alone we’re small, finding our way yet together we create purpose defining outcomes we have yet to imagine welcome to the weave -aw

item.title: falling apart
item.description: may fall be a reminder that it’s never too late to change to begin anew to let go of what was in order to make way for something entirely new -aw

item.title: nature of change
item.description: constant change, in flux, on the move we’re all just adjusting, living, trusting trusting that the universe will place us exactly where we need to be -aw

item.title: homebody
item.description: I don’t think I ever understood what being a homebody felt like until home felt like it could with you until home felt like it could be you nothing could compell me elsewhere -aw

item.title: roots upon roots
item.description: keep mind of where your feet are for presence is a present a gift we must all learn roots upon roots upon roots bound by the universe in all its elements manifest -aw

item.title: earmarked
item.description: you as a book the page-turner every page earmarked, highlighted, and footnotes scribbled in just so I could feel something just so I could help you write those unwritten chapters -aw

item.title: solitude
item.description: solitude my solitude what I’ve learned from you what I’ve learned of me It was never about them It was about me And how I care for them -aw

item.title: let it happen
item.description: may mysteries always lie just around each corner what I need, will come what seeks me, will find me -aw

item.title: a way with
item.description: I usually have a way with words but I saw you and -aw

item.title: are you listening?
item.description: some days you listen to the music some days you are the music it’s always been there but are you listening? -aw

item.title: the wanderers
item.description: we are not special we are mere wanderers of both space and time we create the special by finding someone else who enjoys the mundane just as much wandering, together -aw

item.title: the glass box
item.description: trees sway to and fro behind double panes I sit for what else can this world offer but marbled skies and an open field -aw

item.title: cosmic quandary
item.description: oh, I would have found you in different forms in different lifetimes across timelines, dimensions the shared energy and atoms cosmically inseparable -aw

item.title: beginnings are such delicate times
item.description: for all things preposterous and pronounced letting the wildest reaches of my imagination run rampant on an infinite digital canvas for once you’ve read, you cannot unread let each piece hit you where it must though I hope it soft these are my dreams, hopes, thoughts, joys for all time, always -aw
